56 #ifndef __LIB_BATTERY_DISPATCH_H__

59 namespace battery_dispatch
60 {
61  const size_t constraintCount = 10;
62 }
63 
64 /*
65 Dispatch Base Class - can envision many potential modifications. Goal is to define standard API
66 */
67 class dispatch_t
68 {
69 public:
70 
71  enum FOM_MODES { FOM_LOOK_AHEAD, FOM_LOOK_BEHIND, FOM_FORECAST, FOM_CUSTOM_DISPATCH, FOM_MANUAL };
72  enum BTM_MODES { LOOK_AHEAD, LOOK_BEHIND, MAINTAIN_TARGET, CUSTOM_DISPATCH, MANUAL };
73  enum METERING { BEHIND, FRONT };
74  enum PV_PRIORITY { MEET_LOAD, CHARGE_BATTERY };
75  enum CURRENT_CHOICE { RESTRICT_POWER, RESTRICT_CURRENT, RESTRICT_BOTH };
76  enum FOM_CYCLE_COST {MODEL_CYCLE_COST, INPUT_CYCLE_COST};
77  enum CONNECTION { DC_CONNECTED, AC_CONNECTED };
78 
79  dispatch_t(battery_t * Battery,
80  double dt,
81  double SOC_min,
82  double SOC_max,
83  int current_choice,
84  double Ic_max,
85  double Id_max,
86  double Pc_max,
87  double Pd_max,
88  double t_min,
89  int dispatch_mode,
90  int meter_position);
91 
92  // deep copy constructor (new memory), from dispatch to this
93  dispatch_t(const dispatch_t& dispatch);
94 
95  // copy members from dispatch to this
96  virtual void copy(const dispatch_t * dispatch);
97 
98  void delete_clone();
99 
100  virtual ~dispatch_t();
101 
103  virtual void dispatch(size_t year,
104  size_t hour_of_year,
105  size_t step,
106  double P_system,
107  double V_system,
108  double P_load_ac=0,
109  double P_system_clipped = 0
110  ) = 0;
111 
113  virtual bool check_constraints(double &I, size_t count);
114 
116  virtual void finalize(size_t index, double &I);
117 
118  battery_t * battery_model(){ return _Battery; }
119 
120  // ac outputs
121  double power_tofrom_battery() { return m_batteryPower->powerBattery; }
122  double power_tofrom_grid() { return m_batteryPower->powerGrid; }
123  double power_gen() { return m_batteryPower->powerGeneratedBySystem; }
124  double power_pv_to_load() { return m_batteryPower->powerPVToLoad; }
125  double power_battery_to_load() { return m_batteryPower->powerBatteryToLoad; }
126  double power_grid_to_load() { return m_batteryPower->powerGridToLoad; }
127  double power_pv_to_batt() { return m_batteryPower->powerPVToBattery; }
128  double power_grid_to_batt() { return m_batteryPower->powerGridToBattery; }
129  double power_pv_to_grid() { return m_batteryPower->powerPVToGrid; }
130  double power_battery_to_grid() { return m_batteryPower->powerBatteryToGrid; }
131  double power_conversion_loss() { return m_batteryPower->powerConversionLoss; }
132  double power_system_loss() { return m_batteryPower->powerSystemLoss; }
133 
134  virtual double power_grid_target(){ return 0;}
135  virtual double power_batt_target(){ return 0.;}
136  virtual double cost_to_cycle() { return 0.;}
137 
138  // control settings
139  double battery_power_to_fill(){ return _Battery->battery_power_to_fill(m_batteryPower->stateOfChargeMax); }
140 
141  message get_messages();
142 
144  BatteryPower * getBatteryPower() {
145  return m_batteryPower;
146  };
147 
149  BatteryPowerFlow * getBatteryPowerFlow() {
150  return m_batteryPowerFlow.get();
151  };
152 
153 protected:
154 
156  virtual void runDispatch(size_t year, size_t hour, size_t step);
157 
159  virtual void prepareDispatch(size_t hour_of_year, size_t step, double P_system, double V_system, double P_load_ac = 0, double P_pv_dc_clipped = 0);
160 
161  // Initialization help
162  void init(battery_t * Battery,
163  double dt_hour,
164  int current_choice,
165  double t_min,
166  int mode);
167 
168  // Controllers
169  virtual void SOC_controller();
170  void switch_controller();
171  double current_controller(double battery_voltage);
172  bool restrict_current(double &I);
173  bool restrict_power(double &I);
174 
175  battery_t * _Battery;
176  battery_t * _Battery_initial;
177 
178  double _dt_hour;
179 
185  int _mode;
186 
187  // allocated and managed internally
188  std::unique_ptr<BatteryPowerFlow> m_batteryPowerFlow;
189 
190  // managed elsewhere
191  BatteryPower * m_batteryPower;
192 
193  // Charge & current limits controllers
194  int _current_choice;
195  double _t_min;
196  double _e_max;
197  double _P_target;
198 
199  // rapid charge change controller
200  int _t_at_mode; // [minutes]
201  bool _charging;
202  bool _prev_charging;
203  bool _grid_recharge;
204 
205  // messages
206  message _message;
207 };
208 
209 /*
210 Manual dispatch class
211 */
212 class dispatch_manual_t : public dispatch_t
213 {
214 public:
215  dispatch_manual_t(battery_t * Battery,
216  double dt_hour,
217  double SOC_min,
218  double SOC_max,
219  int current_choice,
220  double Ic_max,
221  double Id_max,
222  double Pc_max,
223  double Pd_max,
224  double t_min,
225  int mode,
226  int meterPosition,
227  util::matrix_t<size_t> dm_dynamic_sched,
228  util::matrix_t<size_t> dm_dynamic_sched_weekend,
229  std::vector<bool> can_charge,
230  std::vector<bool> can_discharge,
231  std::vector<bool> can_gridcharge,
232  std::map<size_t, double> dm_percent_discharge,
233  std::map<size_t, double> dm_percent_gridcharge);
234 
235  // deep copy constructor (new memory), from dispatch to this
236  dispatch_manual_t(const dispatch_t& dispatch);
237 
238  // copy members from dispatch to this
239  virtual void copy(const dispatch_t * dispatch);
240 
241  virtual ~dispatch_manual_t(){};
242 
244  virtual void dispatch(size_t year,
245  size_t hour_of_year,
246  size_t step,
247  double P_system,
248  double V_system = 0,
249  double P_load_ac = 0,
250  double P_system_clipped = 0
251  );
252 
253 protected:
254 
256  virtual void prepareDispatch(size_t hour_of_year, size_t step, double P_system, double V_system, double P_load_ac = 0, double P_pv_dc_clipped = 0);
257 
258  // Initialization help
259  void init(util::matrix_t<float> dm_dynamic_sched,
260  util::matrix_t<float> dm_dynamic_sched_weekend,
261  std::map<size_t, double> dm_percent_discharge,
262  std::map<size_t, double> dm_percent_gridcharge);
263 
264  void init_with_vects(
265  util::matrix_t<size_t> dm_dynamic_sched,
266  util::matrix_t<size_t> dm_dynamic_sched_weekend,
267  std::vector<bool>,
268  std::vector<bool>,
269  std::vector<bool>,
270  std::map<size_t, double> dm_percent_discharge,
271  std::map<size_t, double> dm_percent_gridcharge);
272 
273  void SOC_controller();
274  bool check_constraints(double &I, size_t count);
275 
276  util::matrix_t < size_t > _sched;
277  util::matrix_t < size_t > _sched_weekend;
278 
279  std::vector<bool> _charge_array;
280  std::vector<bool> _discharge_array;
281  std::vector<bool> _gridcharge_array;
282 
283  double _percent_discharge;
284  double _percent_charge;
285 
286  std::map<size_t, double> _percent_discharge_array;
287  std::map<size_t, double> _percent_charge_array;
288 };
289 
291 class grid_point
292 {
297 public:
298  grid_point(double grid = 0., int hour = 0, int step = 0) :
299  _grid(grid), _hour(hour), _step(step){}
300  double Grid() const { return _grid; }
301  int Hour() const { return _hour; }
302  int Step() const { return _step; }
303 
304 private:
305  double _grid;
306  int _hour;
307  int _step;
308 };
309 
310 struct byGrid
311 {
312  bool operator()(grid_point const &a, grid_point const &b)
313  {
314  return a.Grid() > b.Grid();
315  }
316 };
317 typedef std::vector<grid_point> grid_vec;
318 
320 class dispatch_automatic_t : public dispatch_t
321 {
328 public:
329  dispatch_automatic_t(
330  battery_t * Battery,
331  double dt,
332  double SOC_min,
333  double SOC_max,
334  int current_choice,
335  double Ic_max,
336  double Id_max,
337  double Pc_max,
338  double Pd_max,
339  double t_min,
340  int dispatch_mode,
341  int pv_dispatch,
342  size_t nyears,
343  size_t look_ahead_hours,
344  double dispatch_update_frequency_hours,
345  bool can_charge,
346  bool can_clipcharge,
347  bool can_grid_charge
348  );
349 
350  virtual ~dispatch_automatic_t(){};
351 
352  // deep copy constructor (new memory), from dispatch to this
353  dispatch_automatic_t(const dispatch_t& dispatch);
354 
355  // copy members from dispatch to this
356  virtual void copy(const dispatch_t * dispatch);
357 
359  virtual void dispatch(size_t year,
360  size_t hour_of_year,
361  size_t step,
362  double P_system,
363  double V_system,
364  double P_load_ac = 0,
365  double P_system_clipped = 0);
366 
368  virtual void update_dispatch(size_t hour_of_year, size_t step, size_t idx)=0;
369 
371  virtual void update_pv_data(std::vector<double> P_pv_dc);
372 
374  virtual void set_custom_dispatch(std::vector<double> P_batt_dc);
375 
376  /* Check constraints and re-dispatch if needed */
377  virtual bool check_constraints(double &I, size_t count);
378 
379 protected:
380 
382  void init_with_pointer(const dispatch_automatic_t * tmp);
383 
385  int get_mode();
386 
388  double_vec _P_pv_dc;
389 
391  size_t _day_index;
392 
394  size_t _month;
395 
397  size_t _num_steps;
398 
400  double_vec _P_battery_use;
401 
403  size_t _hour_last_updated;
404 
406  size_t _index_last_updated;
407 
409  size_t _d_index_update;
410 
412  double _dt_hour;
413 
415  double _dt_hour_update;
416 
418  size_t _steps_per_hour;
419 
421  size_t _nyears;
422 
424  int _mode;
425 
427  double _safety_factor;
428 
430  size_t _look_ahead_hours;
431 };

434 class dispatch_automatic_behind_the_meter_t : public dispatch_automatic_t
435 {
443 public:
444  dispatch_automatic_behind_the_meter_t(
445  battery_t * Battery,
446  double dt,
447  double SOC_min,
448  double SOC_max,
449  int current_choice,
450  double Ic_max,
451  double Id_max,
452  double Pc_max,
453  double Pd_max,
454  double t_min,
455  int dispatch_mode,
456  int pv_dispatch,
457  size_t nyears,
458  size_t look_ahead_hours,
459  double dispatch_update_frequency_hours,
460  bool can_charge,
461  bool can_clipcharge,
462  bool can_grid_charge
463  );
464 
465  virtual ~dispatch_automatic_behind_the_meter_t(){};
466 
467  // deep copy constructor (new memory), from dispatch to this
468  dispatch_automatic_behind_the_meter_t(const dispatch_t& dispatch);
469 
470  // copy members from dispatch to this
471  virtual void copy(const dispatch_t * dispatch);
472 
474  virtual void dispatch(size_t year,
475  size_t hour_of_year,
476  size_t step,
477  double P_system,
478  double V_system,
479  double P_load_ac = 0,
480  double P_system_clipped = 0);
481 
483  void update_dispatch(size_t hour_of_year, size_t step, size_t idx);
484 
486  void update_load_data(std::vector<double> P_load_dc);
487 
489  void set_target_power(std::vector<double> P_target);
490 
492  double power_grid_target(){ return _P_target_current; };
493  double power_batt_target() { return m_batteryPower->powerBattery; };
494 
495  enum BTM_TARGET_MODES {TARGET_SINGLE_MONTHLY, TARGET_TIME_SERIES};
496 
497 protected:
498 
500  void init_with_pointer(const dispatch_automatic_behind_the_meter_t * tmp);
501 
502  void initialize(size_t hour_of_year);
503  void check_debug(FILE *&p, bool & debug, size_t hour_of_year, size_t idx);
504  void sort_grid(FILE *p, bool debug, size_t idx);
505  void compute_energy(FILE *p, bool debug, double & E_max);
506  void target_power(FILE*p, bool debug, double E_max, size_t idx);
507  void set_battery_power(FILE *p, bool debug);
508  void check_new_month(size_t hour_of_year, size_t step);
509 
511  double_vec _P_load_dc;
512 
514  double_vec _P_target_input;
515 
517  double_vec _P_target_use;
518 
520  double _P_target_month;
521 
523  double _P_target_current;
524 
525  /* Vector of length (24 hours * steps_per_hour) containing grid calculation [P_grid, hour, step] */
526  grid_vec grid;
527 
528  /* Vector of length (24 hours * steps_per_hour) containing sorted grid calculation [P_grid, hour, step] */
529  grid_vec sorted_grid;
530 };

637 class battery_metrics_t
638 {
647 public:
648  battery_metrics_t(double dt_hour);
649  ~battery_metrics_t(){};
650 
651  void compute_metrics_ac(const BatteryPower * batteryPower);
652  //void compute_metrics_dc(const BatteryPower * batteryPower);
653  void compute_annual_loss();
654 
655  void accumulate_energy_charge(double P_tofrom_batt);
656  void accumulate_energy_discharge(double P_tofrom_batt);
657  void accumulate_energy_system_loss(double P_system_loss);
658  void accumulate_battery_charge_components(double P_tofrom_batt, double P_pv_to_batt, double P_grid_to_batt);
659  void accumulate_grid_annual(double P_tofrom_grid);
660  void new_year();
661 
662 
663  // outputs
664  double energy_pv_charge_annual();
665  double energy_grid_charge_annual();
666  double energy_charge_annual();
667  double energy_discharge_annual();
668  double energy_grid_import_annual();
669  double energy_grid_export_annual();
670  double energy_system_loss_annual();
671  double energy_loss_annual();
672  double average_battery_conversion_efficiency();
673  double average_battery_roundtrip_efficiency();
674  double pv_charge_percent();
675 
676 protected:
677 
678  // single value metrics
679  double _e_charge_accumulated; // [Kwh]
680  double _e_discharge_accumulated; // [Kwh]
681  double _e_charge_from_pv; // [Kwh]
682  double _e_charge_from_grid; // [Kwh]
683  double _e_loss_system; // [Kwh]
684 
686  double _average_efficiency;
687 
689  double _average_roundtrip_efficiency;
690 
692  double _pv_charge_percent;
693 
694  // annual metrics
695  double _e_charge_from_pv_annual; // [Kwh]
696  double _e_charge_from_grid_annual; // [Kwh]
697  double _e_loss_system_annual; // [Kwh]
698  double _e_charge_annual; // [Kwh]
699  double _e_discharge_annual; // [Kwh]
700  double _e_grid_import_annual; // [Kwh]
701  double _e_grid_export_annual; // [Kwh]
702  double _e_loss_annual; // [kWh]
703 
704  double _dt_hour;
705 };
